title: defect-seg
description: This program creates some files that allows the user to visualize and evaluate the surface defects that were automatically detected and fixed by the topology correction program.

lh_defects_summary.title: Left Defects Summary
lh_defects_summary.description: Defects summary with ID and number of vertices for left hemisphere.

lh_defect_labels_fix.title: Left Defect Labels Fix
lh_defect_labels_fix.description: Fixed defect labels on the left hemisphere surface.

lh_defect_labels_fix_bin.title: Left Defect Labels Fix Binary
lh_defect_labels_fix_bin.description: Binary labels for fixed defects on the left hemisphere.

lh_defects_nofix_annot.title: Left Defects No-Fix Annotation
lh_defects_nofix_annot.description: Annotation file for defects without fixes on the left hemisphere.

lh_defects_fix_annot.title: Left Defects Fix Annotation
lh_defects_fix_annot.description: Annotation file for defects with fixes on the left hemisphere.

lh_defects_stats.title: Left Defects Stats
lh_defects_stats.description: Statistics summary of defects indicating area and average thickness on the left hemisphere.

rh_defects_summary.title: Right Defects Summary
rh_defects_summary.description: Defects summary with ID and number of vertices for right hemisphere.

rh_defect_labels_fix.title: Right Defect Labels Fix
rh_defect_labels_fix.description: Fixed defect labels on the Right hemisphere surface.

rh_defect_labels_fix_bin.title: Right Defect Labels Fix Binary
rh_defect_labels_fix_bin.description: Binary labels for fixed defects on the right hemisphere.

rh_defects_nofix_annot.title: Right Defects No-Fix Annotation
rh_defects_nofix_annot.description: Annotation file for defects without fixes on the right hemisphere.

rh_defects_fix_annot.title: Right Defects Fix Annotation
rh_defects_fix_annot.description: Annotation file for defects with fixes on the right hemisphere.

rh_defects_stats.title: Right Defects Stats
rh_defects_stats.description: Statistics summary of defects indicating area and average thickness on the right hemisphere.
